question: Kalyan Sona, Girija and Sonalika are varieties of _?
explanation: Kalyan Sona, Girija and Sonalika are variety of Wheat. Sonalika variety is very suitable for late sowings. It is resistant to rusts. Kalyan Sona is double dwarf wheat with wide adaptation recommended for cultivation all over India. Girija is single dwarf variety highly resistant to rusts. This variety is specifically suitable for higher hills of north eastern region of India.
